question: Every bench of the tribunal constituted under NGT 2010, must consist of which of the following?
option1: At least one expert member and two judicial member.
option2: At least two expert member and one judicial member.
option3: At least one expert member and one judicial member.
option4: At least two expert member and two judicial member.
answer: At least one expert member and one judicial member.
explanation: The sanctioned strength of the tribunal constituted under NGT 2010 is 20 expert members and 20 judicial members. Every bench of such tribunal must consist of at least one expert member and one judicial member.
